branding.name: Josh Pointer

hero.title: Mobile Software Engineer
hero.description: Crafting exceptional mobile experiences with React Native & iOS. I bring ideas to life through intuitive and performant mobile applications.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate mobile developer with over 5 years of experience in creating high-performance, user-friendly mobile applications. My expertise lies in React Native and iOS development, and I'm always eager to learn and explore new technologies. I'm driven by the challenge of building innovative solutions that solve real-world problems and enhance user experiences. My goal is to contribute my skills and passion to a dynamic team where I can continue to grow and make a significant impact.

projects.title: E-commerce App
projects.description: A full-featured mobile commerce platform built with React Native and TypeScript, featuring Redux for state management and Stripe for payments.

projects.title: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Native iOS social networking app developed using Swift and SwiftUI, integrated with Firebase for real-time updates and cloud storage.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: Cross-platform fitness application with real-time workout tracking, social features, and cloud sync using AWS AppSync.
